name: Models for community energy
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: As the drive for community energy gathers pace into 2013, this session examines the different models which can be used for new projects.  It considers the future outlook for decentralised energy systems; how communities can go about creating an energy project from scratch; and the various legal and financial structures involved.

presentations.name: Urban energy systems: future outlook for decentralised energy systems
presentations.speakers: Dr Chris Goodier, Senior lecturer, School of Civil & Building Engineering Loughborough University
